title: Nidalee Splash Arts are Wrong

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Me and my friends noticed that the "Fear the Wild" bundle had the wrong splash arts. As you can clearly see in the picture, the pictures on the left are updated while the ones on the right are the old splashes. Just thought I'd let you guys know.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

As Sarutobi said, the new Nidalee assets will be in the new build with the next patch. That said, since the image for the bundle were made prior to the new splashes being available.

Looks like everything is in order with the new patch! :)
thats probably because the splash arts arent on the live client. wait till the patch tonight and it should be correct.
